channel.title: Michael Garifullin Site
channel.description: Recent content on Michael Garifullin Site

item.description: Michael Garifullin - Senior PHP Developer Living in Dublin, Ireland Work Permit in Ireland: Stamp 4 Citizenship: Russia +353 (85) 2209967 mailto:garifullin@gmail.com skypeto:michael.garifullin t.me/blldr SKILLS Good experience with PHP including the latest version. I have pretty strong skills working with Symfony. I have no difficulties with SQL databases. I used MongoDB and Laravel for my pet projects. Rich experience of testing code base in functional and unit way.

Do you remember how much times during you developer career you forgot to add some IDE files to .gitignore? There is a feature that could help you to get rid of creating .gitignore with common excludes for every new project. And this feature is called global .gitignore file.
